data.lyric:

[ar:Consoul Trainin]

[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take Me to Infinity - Consoul Trainin
[00:01.10]Written by：John Efthymiou
[00:02.20]Don't you know you're taking me higher
[00:04.56]
[00:05.84]Oh you know you're making me sweat
[00:08.28]
[00:09.67]Don't you know you're taking me further
[00:12.24]
[00:13.60]To places I have never been
[00:15.60]
[00:17.80]Don't you know I'm nothing without you
[00:20.10]
[00:21.48]Oh you know I can't survive
[00:23.58]
[00:25.17]Oh you're showing me an adventure
[00:27.96]
[00:29.27]Oh you make me feel alive
[00:31.52]

[00:35.11]
